nodes.bodyText: Do we still need to set this if the TableState is DISABLED?
Looks like no need, let me fix it.
Please add some comments to describe the problem here? We need to change the state here otherwise the TRSP scheduled by DTP will try to close the region from a dead server and will never succeed.
this would print server, splitWal and meta correct? or it will print pid, ppid, state etc additionally?

And also here, described why we do not need to set the state. I think the state here should already be CLOSED? And I wonder whether we could reach here, since the region is sitll in OPEN or OPENING state but the server recorded in AM is  already dead so we can not close it in TRSP...
